tool.name: GeEC Slice Matrix

param.name: matrix
param.label: Matrix file
param.help: Select a matrix coming from "GeEC Matrix".

param.name: tsv
param.label: GeEC Annotate tsv file
param.help: Select a tabular file coming from "GeEC Annotate".

param.name: clusters_list
param.label: List of cluster names
param.help: Enter the cluster names to keep (e.g. A-E,H).

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool cut the matrix to keep only the elements contained in the selected clusters.
